Title: Establishes an adopt-a-rural cemetery program
Summary: Directs the secretary of state to develop and implement an adopt-a-rural-cemetery program for the purposes of improving, repairing, and maintaining cemeteries in rural communities which are registered with and overseen by the division of cemeteries; allows municipalities to opt in to the program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing an adopt-a-rural cemetery program
